API Documentation¶

For normal use, all you will have to do to get started is:

from wpCalc import L1WaterProductivity

This will import the following:

  • The class :L1WaterProductivity:`run` and its subclasses
  • Several constants representing the datasets available in Google Earth Engine and the visualization parameters.

The Water Productivity class¶

class wapor_algorithms.L1WaterProductivity¶

Create Water Productivity raster file for annual and dekadal timeframes for Level 1 (Countries and Basins

INCOMPLETE Calculates several statistics for the Water Productivity calculated raster for a chosen country

generate_tiles()¶

INCOMPLETE Split the calculated WPbm in72 tiles facilitating the export

generate_ts(paese, data_start, data_end, dataset)¶

Generate a chart with the mean values calculated for a chosen country

image_export(exp_type, WPbm)¶

INCOMPLETE Export the 72 of the calculated WPbm to Google Drive, GEE Asset or generating a ulr for each tile

WPbm calculation returns all intermediate results besides the final WPbm

aet_aggregated¶

Returns both datasets to be used for WPbm

image_visualization(viz_type, L1_AGBP, ETaColl3, WPbm)¶

Output the calculated WPbm using a map vizualizer or a chart (in this case every componenet of the caluclation is plotted

Generate a map id and a token for the calcualted WPbm raster file

multiply_npp¶

Returns the dataset to be used in conjunction with Actual Evapotranspiration for WPbm

=======
class wapor_algorithms.L1WaterProductivity¶

Create Water Productivity raster file for annual and dekadal timeframes for Level 1 (Countries and Basins

aet_aggregated()¶

Aggregate actual evapotranspiration for annual calculation or water productivity

agbp_aggregated()¶

Aggregate above ground biomass productivity for annual calculation or water productivity

date_selection(**kwargs)¶

Modify date for selecting datasets to be used for WPgm

generate_areal_stats_fusion_tables(fusion_table, query_string, wbpm_calc)¶

Calculates several statistics for the Water Productivity calculated raster for a chosen dataset/name

generate_tiles()¶

INCOMPLETE Split the calculated WPbm in 100 tiles facilitating the export

image_export(exp_type, wpgb)¶

INCOMPLETE Export the 72 of the calculated wpgb to Google Drive, GEE Asset or generating a url for each tile

image_selection()¶

Filter datasets selecting only images within the starting end ending date to be used for WPbm

static image_visualization(raster_name, raster_plot)¶

Output the calculated raster using a map vizualizer

map_id_getter(**outputs_id)¶

Generate a map id and a token for the calcualted WPbm raster file

multiply_npp¶

Sets the dataset to be used in conjunction with Actual Evapotranspiration for WPgb

transpiration()¶

Aggregate transpiration using acttual evapotranspiration,above ground biomas productivity and t_fraction

water_productivity_gross_biomass()¶

wp_gross_biomass calculation returns all intermediate results besides the final wp_gross_biomass

water_productivity_net_biomass()¶

wp_net_biomass calculation returns all intermediate results besides the final wp_gross_biomass

static water_productivity_net_biomass_pre_calculated_annual_values(year)¶

wp_net_biomass calculation simplified method using precalculated annual value fot AGBP and T

Constants¶

  • _L1_AGBP_SEASONAL is projects/fao-wapor/L1_AGBP
  • _L1_AGBP_DEKADAL is projects/fao-wapor/L1_AGBP250
  • _L1_ETa_DEKADAL is projects/fao-wapor/L1_AET
  • _L1_AET250 is users/lpeiserfao/AET250
  • _L1_NPP_DEKADAL is projects/fao-wapor/L1_NPP250
  • VisPar_AGBPy
  • VisPar_ETay
  • VisPar_WPbm
